item1: Gold extracted naturally-oxidized ores either milling heap leaching, depending amount gold contained ore, amenability ore treatment related capital operating costs. Higher grade oxide ores generally processed through mills, where ore ground into fine powder mixed water into slurry, which then passes through carbon-in-leach circuit recover gold. Lower grade oxide ores generally processed using heap leaching. Heap leaching consists stacking crushed run-of-mine ore impermeable, synthetically lined pads where weak cyanide solution applied surface heap dissolve gold contained within ore.
